meanings.definition: Stokesias: a genus of plants in the family Asteraceae
meanings.sent1: The stokesias in the garden have beautiful purple flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted some stokesias in my backyard to attract butterflies.
meanings.sent3: The stokesias in the park seemed to be gossiping with the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her love for stokesias bloomed like a garden in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The stokesias swayed gently in the breeze, a colorful dance in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Stokesias: plural form of stokesia, a type of flowering plant
meanings.sent1: The stokesias in the vase brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: We admired the stokesias growing along the roadside.
meanings.sent3: The stokesias at the flower shop were having a party with the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The field of stokesias was a sea of vibrant colors, a floral tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the stokesias seemed to whisper secrets to the wind.
